attributes.action: investigate insulation grants for old people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: dear sir ,i have tried in vain to get an eldely lady of 83 loft lagging for here bungalow. the system  is slow and the companys supplying this service dont seem to know what they are doing the whole thing needs a good shake up.this lady is freezing.to date it has taken me some 12 weeks to get a response ,and now i have had to apply to yet another company and that going to take another six weeks to send a man round to look.by which time she could be fozen to death. please do somthing!
